sentence_zh_TW: 雖然她在城市中有很多朋友，但有時她仍然感到非常孤獨。
sentence: Although she has many friends in the city, she sometimes feels very ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們約好明天一起去爬山，希望天氣會很好。
sentence: We made plans to go hiking ______ and hope that the weather will be nice.

sentence_zh_TW: 他在班級中的排名是第十四，這讓他感到有些失望，但也激勵他更努力學習。
sentence: His ranking in the class was the ______, which made him feel a bit disappointed but also motivated him to study harder.

sentence_zh_TW: 今天是我們計劃已久的團聚，期待見到許久未見的朋友。
sentence: ______ is the day of our long-awaited reunion, and I can't wait to see friends I haven't seen in a long time.

sentence_zh_TW: 這棵樹圍繞著整個花園，為我們提供了陰影和美麗的景色。
sentence: The tree grows ______ the entire garden, providing us with shade and a beautiful view.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個家裡的廚房是所有家庭聚會的中心，大家都喜歡在這裡一起烹飪和聚會。
sentence: The ______ in this house is the center for all family gatherings, where everyone loves to cook and hang out together.

sentence_zh_TW: 每晚獲得足夠的睡眠對於身心健康和提高日間的生產力至關重要。
sentence: Getting enough ______ every night is essential for both physical and mental health, as well as improving daytime productivity.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這種情況下，說謊不會導致他們的脫身，反而會讓問題變得更加複雜。
sentence: In this situation, to ______ will not help them escape but will only complicate matters further.

sentence_zh_TW: 這種疾病在老年人中非常普遍，醫生建議定期檢查以防患於未然。
sentence: This disease is very ______ among the elderly, and doctors recommend regular check-ups to prevent any unforeseen issues.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你把這個蛋糕切成四分之一，將會有四個人能夠分到一塊。
sentence: If you cut this cake into a ______, four people will be able to each have a piece.

sentence_zh_TW: 那艘船正準備出海，裝滿了貨物，並希望能在新世界中找到新的貿易機會。
sentence: The ______ is ready to set sail, loaded with goods, hoping to find new trading opportunities in the new world.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這堂課中，老師教學生們有關生命週期的重要課程，並解釋生命的相互連結。
sentence: In this ______, the teacher educates the students about the important lessons of the life cycle, explaining the interconnectedness of life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在機場的告別是充滿情感的，因為每個人都知道他們要說再見，並期待再次見面。
sentence: The farewell at the airport was emotional, as everyone knew they had to say ______ and looked forward to meeting again.

sentence_zh_TW: 這本書的頁面非常厚，使得整本書看上去像是一個重量級的小說。
sentence: The pages of this book are very ______, making the entire book appear as a hefty novel.

sentence_zh_TW: 當他走進那家公司時，他想像的年薪是十萬美元，而實際上卻只有千元。
sentence: When he entered the company, he imagined an annual salary of a hundred thousand dollars, but it turned out to be only a thousand.

sentence_zh_TW: 在北半球，炎熱的夏季通常從六月開始，為人們提供了許多戶外活動的機會。
sentence: In the northern hemisphere, the hot summer season usually begins in ______, providing many opportunities for outdoor activities.

sentence_zh_TW: 在面對挑戰時，快速有效的行動計劃往往能幫助團隊做出明智的決策。
sentence: When faced with challenges, a quick and effective ______ plan can often help the team make informed decisions.

sentence_zh_TW: 三月的到來標誌著春天的開始，帶來了溫暖的天氣和盛開的花朵。
sentence: The arrival of ______ marks the beginning of spring, bringing warm weather and blooming flowers.

sentence_zh_TW: 在許多文化中，魚被視為健康飲食的重要組成部分，尤其是富含omega-3脂肪酸的魚類。
sentence: In many cultures, ______ is seen as an important part of a healthy diet, especially fatty fish rich in omega-3 fatty acids.

sentence_zh_TW: 在早晨的陽光中，一隻美麗的鳥在樹上歡快地歌唱，為周圍的環境增添了活力。
sentence: In the morning sun, a beautiful ______ sings cheerfully in the tree, adding vitality to its surroundings.
